text: Gerd Cintl (11 December 1938 – 26 December 2017) was a German rower. He competed for the United Team of Germany in the 1960 Summer Olympics. He was born in Düsseldorf, Germany. In 1960, he was a crew member of the German boat which won the gold medal in the coxed fours event. Cintl died on 26 December 2017 at the age of 79.Wir trauern um Gerd Cintl ==References== Category:1938 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Sportspeople from Düsseldorf Category:German rowers Category:Olympic gold medalists for Germany
title: Gerd Cintl
